Publications List

Journals

  • Vavlas et al. (2023) Imaging the Sources of the March 2021 Seismic Sequence in Thessaly Basin (Central Greece) from Kinematic Slip Inversion and Backprojection of Waveform Envelopes. Bulletin of the Seismological Society of America 2023; doi: https://doi.org/10.1785/0120230024

Conferences

  • Fountoulakis, I. and Evangelidis, C. (2022) SSA2py: A seismic source imaging tool in Python based on the Source-Scanning Algorithm, EGU General Assembly 2022, Vienna, Austria, 23–27 May 2022, EGU22-3800, https://doi.org/10.5194/egusphere-egu22-3800.

  • Fountoulakis, I. and Evangelidis, C. (2021) Introducing the SSA2py: Source-Scanning Algorithm in Python, ESC General Assembly 2021, Virtual, 19-24 September 2021.
